gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 136, Pistons 125
gameRecap.excerpt: Kawhi Leonard totaled his third consecutive 30-point game with 33 points (12-17 FG, 6-8 3PT), along with four rebounds and three assists as the Clippers defeated the Pistons 136-125. Russell Westbrook went 10-13 for 23 points and nine assists as Paul George added 18 points and seven assists for Los Angeles, who had seven players in double-figures overall. Jaden Ivey (28 points, seven rebounds) and Bojan Bogdanovic (26 points) led the Pistons in defeat. The Clippers move to 32-15 (4-1 on current road trip) as the Pistons fall to 6-42.
